body_html:
Also a good way to get up and running is to use conda virtual environments
https://conda.io/miniconda.html

They also offer cudnn as a dependency and all tensorflow versions can be installed with pip within that environment

https://conda.io/miniconda.html
They also offer cudnn as a dependency and all tensorflow versions can be installed with pip within that environment
body:
Also a good way to get up and running is to use conda virtual environments
https://conda.io/miniconda.html

They also offer cudnn as a dependency and all tensorflow versions can be installed with pip within that environment
